social_media.title: Social Media Management
social_media.short_description: Complete social media management across all major platforms

web_development.title: Web Development
web_development.short_description: High-impact web and e-commerce solutions with modern technology
web_development.description: Since 2009, Be Group has delivered high-impact web and e-commerce solutions across MENA. We use modern stacks and Agile/Scrum to ship robust, maintainable products—on time. From custom websites to complex e-commerce platforms and mobile applications.

google_ads.title: Google Ads (AdWords)
google_ads.short_description: Data-driven Google Ads campaigns that scale and convert
google_ads.description: Be Group is a 2023 Google Premier Partner with certified strategists, strong optimization scores, and proven spend management. We build data-driven campaigns that scale with comprehensive keyword research, bid strategy optimization, and performance tracking.

seo.title: SEO Optimization
seo.short_description: Full-stack SEO for sustainable organic growth
seo.description: Full-stack SEO: technical audits, on-page optimization, content strategy, and high-quality link building. We pair research with clean IA and UX to grow qualified traffic sustainably. Transparent communication with regular reporting shows what's moving the needle.

google_maps.title: Google Maps Optimization
google_maps.short_description: Local SEO and Google Business Profile optimization
google_maps.description: Optimize your Business Profile to win local intent across Search and Maps. We manage photos, posts, offers, reviews, and messaging to convert discovery into visits and calls. Perfect for businesses with physical locations or local service areas.

media_production.title: Media Production
media_production.short_description: End-to-end media production with broadcast-grade quality
media_production.description: End-to-end production: scripting, directing, shooting, editing, motion graphics, VFX, and sound design. We deliver broadcast-grade results tailored to your brand voice. From corporate videos to commercials and social media content.

branding.title: Branding & Identity
branding.short_description: Research-backed visual identities that scale across all touchpoints
branding.description: Research-backed visual identities—logos, palettes, typography, guidelines, and assets—that align with your positioning and scale across print and digital touchpoints. We create cohesive brand experiences that resonate with your target audience.

consultation.title: Business Consultation
consultation.short_description: Strategic consulting for marketing and product development
consultation.description: Marketing and product consulting: market analysis, opportunity mapping, brand development, CX/CRM improvements, and measurable go-to-market plans. We help businesses identify growth opportunities and create actionable strategies.
